Progressive Hairy Cell Leukemia
															                    Treatment for progressive hairy cell leukemia may include the following:         -  Chemotherapy.    -  Biologic therapy.    -  Splenectomy.    - A clinical trial of chemotherapy and targeted therapy with a monoclonal antibody (rituximab).
